p: The fish were monitored for 33 days throughout the challenge. Five fish per species and treatment (IP and bath challenge, including respective controls) were sampled at 10 days post-challenge (pc) (for common carp and goldfish) and 12 days (for Atlantic salmon). At 20 days pc, 10 Atlantic salmon and common carp and 8 goldfish were sampled, while all the remaining fish were sampled at 33 days.
